message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable product. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm looking for a serious buyer who can appreciate its worth. My initial offer is $18000.
I appreciate the unique opportunity to acquire the product, but I'm on a budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $14000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I understand you're on a budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I'm getting a fair price for the product. My counteroffer is $16500.
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $15500. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still not comfortable going below $17000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to ensure I'm getting a fair price for the product. My counteroffer is $16750.
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a final counteroffer of $15500. I'm willing to walk away if this isn't acceptable to you.
